TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IList implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type IList = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示可按照索引单独访问的对象的非泛型集合。

span.span: Represents a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的后代接口，并是所有非泛型列表的基接口。 is a descendant of the interface and is the base interface of all non-generic lists. 实现分为三类： 只读的、 固定大小和变量大小。 implementations fall into three categories: read-only, fixed-size, and variable-size. 一个只读的不能修改。A read-only cannot be modified. 固定大小不允许添加或删除的元素，但它允许修改现有元素。A fixed-size does not allow the addition or removal of elements, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 可变大小允许添加、 删除和修改元素。A variable-size allows the addition, removal, and modification of elements. 此接口的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this interface, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#01)]

span.span: Removes all items from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现可以处理的方式改变和集合的容量。Implementations of this method can vary in how they handle the and the capacity of a collection. 通常情况下，将计数设置为零，并且对其他对象的集合的元素也被释放。Typically, the count is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量可设置为零或一个默认值，或可保持不变。The capacity can be set to zero or a default value, or it can remain unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

span.span: The is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象并上的方法`item`以确定是否存在项。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether item exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断和方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象并上的方法`item`以确定是否存在项。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether item exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断和方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object)
public: void Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value);
abstract member Insert : int * obj -> unit

param.name: index
param.span: 从零开始的索引，应在该位置插入 value。

span.span: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入到 中的对象。

span.span: The object to insert into the .

summary.span: 在 中的指定索引处插入一个项。

span.span: Inserts an item to the at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 等于 中的项数，则将 `value` 追加到末尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the , then `value` is appended to the end. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 语言使用关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(object value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 要从 中删除的对象。

span.span: The object to remove from the .

summary.span: 从 中移除特定对象的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 如果在 `value` 中找不到 ，则 保持不变且不引发异常。If `value` is not found in the , the remains unchanged and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口来创建简单的列表，固定大小列表。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 此代码是为一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

para.span: 具体而言，它不应引发异常。

span.span: In particular, it should not throw an exception.
